name: SSSwiftUISideMenu
summary: SSSwiftUISideMenu is a custom Side Menu with customisable UI as per your choice.
description: 'SSSwiftUISideMenu is highly customisable and easy to use Side menu control for iOS Applications. It support the SideMenu operations from left / right panel. user can navigate through the container views that added with the SideMenu MenuItems. It allows user to customise UI and animation style of their choice.'
